thing.title: Dodecahedron Sponge Experiment
thing.author: syvwlch
thing.description: Another, more solid TopMod experiment which may be printable without supports.This one starts with a dodecahedron, turns it into a first order menger sponge (en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Menger_spongeYes, they don't HAVE to be based on cubes... ) and then plays some additional games with it.
